title: Harris Lied, But Pence Won | Guests: Dinesh D’Souza & Steve Deace | 10/8/20
description:
VP Mike Pence destroyed Sen. Kamala Harris in the vice presidential debate and afterward, Donald Trump Jr. gave his take to Glenn. President Trump said he won’t agree to a virtual debate next week. While the media covers for Kamala Harris who dodged the question about packing the Supreme Court and fracking, Glenn has what Biden said just last year. BlazeTV’s Steve Deace gives his thoughts on why the polls – even Rasmussen – have Trump performing terribly. Filmmaker Dinesh D’Souza discusses the possibility of “cultural secession” if Biden wins. True the Vote’s Catherine Engelbrecht shows a great tool to see for yourself how the Left is changing voting rules. Jason Buttrill breaks down the Democrats’ plan moving forward.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
